param.name: case_dir
param.label: OpenFOAM Case Directory
param.help: Full path to OpenFOAM case directory

param.name: load_cmd
param.label: Command to Load OpenFOAM
param.help: E.g.: module load, spack load, source, export PATH=, etc

param.name: __numberOfSubdomains__
param.label: Number of Subdomains
param.help: OpenFOAM parameter numberOfSubdomains in the system/decomposeParDict file

param.name: __nx_ny_nz__
param.label: Coefficients to Split Mesh in the x, y and z Directions
param.help: OpenFOAM parameter coeffs in the system/decomposeParDict file. Note that the multiplication of these values must be equal to the number of subdomains

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select SLURM Partition or PBS Queue
param.help: Job will submitted using SSH, sbatch or qsub, respectively

param.name: _sch__dd_partition_e_
param.label: Slurm Partition
param.help: Name of the SLURM partition to run the OpenFOAM cases

param.name: scheduler_directives
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. --mem=1000;--gpus-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the SBATCH keyword.

param.name: _sch__d_q___
param.label: PBS queue
param.help: Queue to submit the interactive job. Must select one! Use [qstat -f -Q] to list all queues on the system

param.name: scheduler_directives
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. -l mem=1000;-l nodes=1:ppn=4 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the PBS keyword.

param.name: workdir
param.label: Shared Work Directory
param.help: This directory must be shared between the compute and login nodes. This parameter overwrites the working directory in the resource definition page
